WRITING.TITLE: OnePlus 7T McLaren Edition Screen Protector
WRITING.TEXT: What do you guys recommend for a screen protector? I bought one off of Amazon that only had adhesive on the edge and didn't stick AT ALL. Absolute garbage and now I don't trust any of the glass screen protectors there. Not a fan of film protectors but if they're literally the only good option then I will be willing.
Hey, thanks for the reply, I appreciate it! I'm not fond of the glue. Could be easy to mess up and get in places you don't want. I read some reviews of people saying it spilling out and whatnot.

WRITING.TITLE: Whitestone Some glass
WRITING.TEXT: Anyone use this screen protector? I'm wondering if it was supposed to come with a speaker masking film. Mine didn't have it. Just making sure.
Literally 5 seconds ago I found the speaker sticker. Somehow it fell into my lap and I didn't see it...
Haven't been able to do this with my Galex yet but here's my Nef. https://imgur.com/gallery/lEncnYS
How do you combine them?
I think I need a video to understand how this works.
If you have to wait until it goes giant to plant the next, wouldn't it be better to just harvest it? Unless it's a regrowing one of course.

WRITING.TITLE: Question about Robin in recent anime episode.
WRITING.TEXT: So when Robin got caught by the Ninja squad and cornered her, they all attacked her. However, she escaped and revealed that the one they attacked was a copy. She came out of it seemingly with no damage whatsowver, even though the clone was clearly attacked. My question is did she overcome her weakness of sharing damage with her clones? How could she even do such a thing? Her clones are literally her and her body parts.
I don't see how her clones are any different from her limbs. She's just copying everything instead of a single body part.

So when exactly are you supposed to inflict sleep? It seems to me holding off on S1 loses a lot more dps while waiting than any marginal gain from doing it at the right moment. It's not even a 100% to sleep. You can wait for the right moment, throw it out, and not work.
What's the story behind evil Alphonse?
It took them 1 and a half years to add a replay button. They might not be the smartest people.
Omg you reminded me of that. Those were the dark dark times...
So you think Eze should run Arctos even if they have MUB Mars?
I did one run where I stunned moon and he lost it as expected. Another run I stunned moon and nothing happened. We all died.
I missed the first event last year so I don't understand the context.
So this is a known character from last year?
Unbelievable. Imagine beating the hardest content in the game quicker than some of the early-mid game quests...
I saw a 2.2 mil in there.
I'd also like to add a shared freeze skill like from DY Cleo can freeze him multiple times and can be used to skip moons and squalls.
OG Chopper gang rise up!
That would make it more regular...
And not a single thing about the encyclopedia... I'm pretty sure they said back in September or October or something last year that it would be coming out in March this year but look where we are.
I don't get it.
That's what I thought too. I use it after Eze does her S1 and I think 200k is good damage. But then I pick a different skill like Ranzal or Veronica and 200k is on the low end.
While I agree about the lower sp cost, Mars and Marth makes it a non issue.
There's a 4 healer mVolk in a faster time. Brotel on YT.
Ahhhh. XD

WRITING.TITLE: [RF4] Advice for taming max level Dead Tree.
WRITING.TEXT: I'm on a crusade to tame all of the high level monsters at max enemy levels. It's hard enough that I have to get lucky with a particular monster to even appear in Banquet of Nightmares, but Dead Tree is particularly tough since it's attacks seem to be physical. Im having a hard time dodging all of the apples that circle it and the ones that drop from the sky. A single apple will one shot me. Anyone have any advice to get this thing? I know about brushing and love attack weapons, but that seems to be impossible at this point.
Really? The apples are love? I gotta go try it.

I'm familiar with how to get to specific monsters and taming them. I've already got all the faeries both large and small, Terrable, Firesome, Grimoire, Ambrosia, Siren, and Deathwall. It's still tedious and difficult regardless. It's still not that easy to dodge when you have a 1 character width space to dodge the falling apples while still having to dodge the circling apples. And then brushing and feeding is another hurdle to go through when you can be one shot by any of the 20 or so flying projectiles.
Good idea about the throwing ring. When I tried, I gave up on brushing too and found it was difficult for the thrown item to reach while trying to maintain a safe distance.

This right here is the answer. I tried it on a low level tree and started absorbing the apples. Thank you so much! The upgrade is Tyrant Turnip though. Which are giant turnips. Confused me at first since giant radishes do something else.
Yeah I caught it soon after I made that comment. It was so effortless after I was able to not worry about the apples anymore. gt;. lt; Thanks again!
Unfortunately, I don't think it's a good idea with my mere 6k wrymite.
Me right now. Only have 1 left and several characters I want to spiral.
I don't know why but the red Trick or Tan lettering with green border over the other green banner in the first panel is really fucking my eyes up.
It didn't help Celly so I why should I expect anything different for Helly?

WRITING.TITLE: Constant email notifications.
WRITING.TEXT: I can turn all notifications off or community reminders or whatever, and still get emails from reddit about a post from some random subreddit. What can I do so that I don't get email notifications from reddit?
Wondering if anyone else has insight.
Nobody sees a black panther? His pecs are like the upper lips of cats.
Also, another month without a single mention of the encyclopedia.
That was true before the spirals. The marginal increase in his overall mods makes it a marginal spiral.
No bunny for me so my water is even worse than normal.
87k on break. Like what?

I don't think Karina's spiral is good at all and I can't fathom why she's been put up so high on a pedestal. She got a buff skill on her S2. Her self buffs are insignificant compared to the amount of buffs she can get from teammates, so that change doesn't do much for her. She gets 100% skill prep, but she could do that before. She got practically no increase in skill damage, so any significant increase in damage since her spiral is attributable to solely the increased stats she gets from additional levels and spirals. I don't like the drastic change in people's opinions of her viability when she's pretty much the same and was usable before spiral. It might have to do with there being no content for water stun units, but we'll never know.
Easiest way I think is to remove augments. It costs like 2m gold for each 100 augment.

Usually they post news about a character the day before it's available. Usually this happens on Sunday since Monday is event change. Not this time though. Last time this happened, water spiral characters were delayed a day.
But you can only iframe it with his s1 without the Agito skill. S1 should be up before Agito skill anyways but keep that in mind.

WRITING.TITLE: Another Tiki bug?
WRITING.TEXT: Just noticed in A amp;O that Tiki's health bars do not match. There's the health bar the the player controller sees under the portrait at the bottom and the teammate health bars in the top left. Top left seems to always show full no matter what. Maybe that's why there's bugs with teammates not healing Tiki, since they're seeing she's at full health and doesn't need a heal? I'd add a pic if I new how.
Still holding out hope that one day we can trade moonstones for sun stones.

WRITING.TITLE: Small improvement to mentor bonuses.
WRITING.TEXT: We all know it's a horrible system that doesn't in any way promote actually mentoring people and is nothing but a mere limited wrymite farm. Additionally, hdts are dead content that are beaten by much easier quests with much better rewards. However, I think there should be a change to make the grind less tedious and horrible than it is. They should change it so that you get a mentor bonus for each person that gets a first clear. And I don't understand why this isn't the case. The current system is set up that if you manage to carry 3 other newbies, whether or not they contribute in anyway (just ran with 2 3k might newbies), you only get one bonus. I've already left my feedback. Hopefully if this gets enough traction a change is made, or the system in it's entirety gets a look over.
How? All it does it get you the same amount quicker without you having to do it more times than necessary. Please show me where I said remove the weekly limit.
Well yeah, I mention at the end they should look at the whole thing again but this only makes it a little less crap.

That wasn't the point? "A small improvement". I've already stated the system is crap. The point was that since it's only used for hunting wrymite, make it a little less crap at least. I even mention at the end that bringing notice to it could lead them to looking at the whole system over. If anything, having to hunt for it less means those people just wanting to play the game run into less hunters. Also, what does that have to do with the other poster talking about wanting more wrymite?
140k-150k on break with a crit with a spiral? XD I gotta say, I haven't been impressed with any of the water spirals so far, especially with my favorite character and first 4* character, Karina.
Eh, Elly still has doubts after all this time so not completely redeemed to me.
She got her ass beat because she was distracted because she STILL has doubts about Euden. Nah, not completely clear for me yet.
I thought the panther thing was obvious and everyone knew it. Saw it immediately. *Shock*

WRITING.TITLE: Messed up the leather seating in my car.
WRITING.TEXT: The seats got wet when rain slipped through a window cracked open. I didn't dry it off and now it's all shriveled and hard. I've been using a cleaner/conditioner solution but it doesn't seem to do much. Anyone know what else I should do?
I just downloaded Manga reader from the app store but it only lists one source and no more will show up. Can't even read the one I want to read. Any clue what I can do?
Yes. That's how I know only one source is showing up. I only have one source on my list.
It's the pink world icon in the top left. I'd include a pic if I knew how. It's only showing the source from mangareader.
It's going to be an ugly CGI white pointy tube monster.
A pink/red background with a white letter M.
The first pinned topic had the solution lol. Thanks. Now I just need to know what sources people actually use, since I can't find the one manga I want to read, Attack on Titan.

For the multiple single summon thing, I was hoping they would add the ability to stop summons after you get a 5* even if you wanted to summon 10 at a time, like the tickets in raid battles. Maybe they can add it in the future.

WRITING.TITLE: A pretty funny bug while playing as Hulk.

WRITING.TEXT: HULK SPIN!

WRITING.TITLE: I think interrupting a command grab heroic freezes (T-poses?) enemies.

WRITING.TEXT: Lol that's what I was thinking. HULK PIROUETTE!
It's great in an open area but the camera often has a hard time figuring out what to do if there's any kind of obstruction nearby.
Not sure if it's the same for anyone else but the video is unplayable for me because the video quality is just so low.
Probably because she's still good and would be a better version of her gala self with a spiral.

Is this an atypical run? I got drastically different results and it looks like it has to do with my dps units getting debuffed at the beginning while yours doesn't. Your units seem to achieve the miracle of the melee units successfully walking through Tarty to avoid his first dash, the ranged units avoiding being sucked in by the black hole, and the melee units avoiding being blown up by the black hole afterwards. Chitose 45 mc, different 50% skill prep print, 0UB TSG Malora summer paladyns, odd sparrows Faf and dracolith not maxed Those differences affect dps, but it doesn't matter since they're getting debuffed anyways.
Yo 11 months since the reveal of the encyclopedia now and nothing.

Yeah they're in the same position. Even the skill shares. Only differences are the ones listed. My graphics settings are different but I don't see how that would affect anything. Can't hurt to try though.

This team worked a lot better for me than the other one, even though I had the same units. I think the 25% skill prep instead of 50% helped with the iframe and the additional ranged unit made it one less melee unit to get debuffed. I ran the other team so many times and would only rarely get a clear but this one worked immediately and I even got a 1:31 clear. I had to swap Scleo for Mitsu in the line up order though so that if Chitose went down or was stuck in a bubble, the second unit wouldn't go into the portal because they aren't a melee.

I have the pro. Honestly, I'd change it if i could. It has some problems. Some settings might change randomly. Most apparent is the auto dim setting. Sometimes it'll turn off on its own. It'll also sometimes lag with certain applications. An example is when I'm typing on a message board on a browser, the test doesn't display at all unless I switch home and back. It could just be the browser, but I have the same issue with the reddit app with posts not loading unless I back out then in again. My biggest problem with gaming though is that you can't hide the home bar, so while playing coop, I'll accidentally click the home or recent apps button and I'd immediately get kicked out.

I don't seem to use his dodge and dash attacks very often, since his combos seem to flow together we'll enough that you don't need to cancel. And his aerial combat is good enough that a jump cancel is all you need. With that said, I can't seem to dodge cancel into a dash attack, like I can with others. Anyone else the same?
Yeah, I keep mistaking Ironman for a bot enemy. And if I'm a flying character and looking at stuff in the distance, I mistake the other heroes for enemies too.

Yeah I guess if that's what they're called. If it can be set to for only during certain apps, I'd try it. But I've used phones with the bar there for too long to be able to change it to other methods painlessly. My previous phone had it and it was an LG G7 I think. Or 5 I don't remember anymore.

I consider the combat a get shot in the back simulator. Too much shit going on that you can't see that just hits you out of nowhere. I think the camera is too close even on wide. I read a post from someone mentioning that in DMC, enemies are less aggressive if they're off screen. This game needs something like that.
A lot of times they don't do anything while I'm sitting there bleeding out.
Not saying I agree or disagree but you shouldn't have to be at endgame levels to have fun or feel strong.
And then you get hit by an offscreen attack lol. Such is the way.
Can you parry red attacks with cap?
And then he keeps holding on to it while standing there eating bullets from turrets and drones.
This is far too common and even more difficult to see when you're trying to fight some mobs. I'm trying to have fun beating up a guy but get shot in the back a lot.
I read a comment saying that in DMC, enemies that are off screen are less aggressive so you don't get hit in the back to unreactable attacks.
Lmao on my first run on this mission at this part, that plane did not spawn, and cap literally ran off the edge on his own to his death.
Really hoping for a vid for this.

WRITING.TITLE: Small tech I found for Thor. Light combo into double Heavy finisher.

WRITING.TEXT: Not sure if anyone else knows this. I don't imagine it being too difficult to find out though. Basically just dodge right after the animation for the heavy finisher comes out. I don't think timer is that tight but you can see me mess it up a few times. Can change directions for the 2nd hit and can be done normally or with his support heroic. Didn't have time to test other finishers or other characters.

Aside from ai spawning in the path of flight characters, they get in the way and are sometimes literally a wall when you're trying to fight someone. You can't push them aside and you're stuck swinging at a guy out of arms reach because your ai is in-between both of you.
Time for some testing!
I want a camera reset button to force the camera behind you.
This has happened to me as Cap and Ironman. The latter was weird since it appeared it happened after activating an elevator.
They would then return the physical.
She's got dead eyes though.
Tbf, it's not like you're gonna use those ingots on anything else now.
I missed last year's anniversary so I still barely know anything about him. The rerun will finally catch me up on all the events I missed.
Cosmic PP is warm. And then there are the others. That's how I remember it.

Sure, you can shoot them out of the air, but try doing that in the middle of trying to beat down some people. More likely you're going to eat a rocket that you don't see coming and get downed in one shot.
The iconic missions say guaranteed legendary and purple but beating it only gives a purple. What the heck?

Borderlands has a bunch of enemies throwing shit at you too and it has a mechanic where at full health no matter how much damage is done to you, you can't be one shot and are brought down to a certain health.
That was literally the fix though.

I saw it in the tutorial too and I took it as that was a bug. More text that they didn't say correctly. I still believe parrying red attacks without being in BB is a bug. Otherwise, what would be the point of the skill upgrade?

WRITING.TITLE: Enemy ranged tracking is just ridiculous.
Thor has just completely given up. Even he can't stand the state of this game.
The Captain can also be The Rhino.

WRITING.TEXT: Yeah we all know about the missle dance. This one, like that, is just another symptom of the absurd tracking the ranged attacks have. This guy shot and the bullets curved around and hit me from BEHIND him!
I'm guessing her spec is to build heroic charge when overcharged? And what's the Cap vid?

I agree with your logic regarding spending a lot of time looking at your own character. I thought about having the indicators on your own character too. But I also thought it would basically be going off all the time because there are so many enemies targeting you, you wouldn't know how to react properly. Unless they fundamentally change the way enemy targeting works, I think that will be an issue. Another problem I have with the current system is that if your camera is directly behind your character and you're hitting someone, it's a very good chance that you'll completely block their model and it would be very difficult to watch for any tells from the enemy unless you play with the camera at an angle. Happens more frequently with Hulk and his big body.
Now I know what to look for when building her. :)
Hulk picks up a tank in the opening fight. He can't pick up anything other than robots afterwards.
Posting to refer back to.

I don't need a git gud dood coming in here spouting that mess. I wasn't even trying to dodge. I attacked when I thought I was in range for the aerial light to move in close, but it didn't. That's why I'm attacking air. Then I dodged twice to close the gap, at which point I was behind him and the bullets freaking looped up and tagged me while I was behind him. How is it my fault that some bot shooting forward can hit a target behind it? Why would I think I should have to dodge at that point?
Somehow you managed to miss the point of both the video and the comment.
Another git good dood that also missed the point of the vid. It seems to me you missed the point of the missle dance vid too.
Point 2 describes Monster Hunter. This game is no Monster Hunter.
Do they typically involve fighting dozens of mooks on and off screen at the same time too?
We can agree to disagree but I don't see how a looney tunes gun that hits behind the shooter is fine.

I think you and others are under the impression that I'm upset because I got downed. I'm upset that I got hit with a backward turning bullet. I know I'm not the best player. I straight up missed the dodge with the melee attack. And it's easy to criticize watching a clip after the fact. I'm flying through the stage, I see the first enemy I meet, and a lone enemy too, and blast him while I approach. I'm supposed to weigh all of my options, a god blast, a pin, etc., instead of just smashing a guy after I spawn in because I want to hammer something, all in literally less than a second from indication to release of the attack. That's besides the point though. I closed the gap because I wanna smash, ended up behind him, and still got shot.

Yes it does, because your points about my gameplay is irrelevant. I'm not upset that I didn't use my entire arsenal in an encounter that lasted a few seconds and went down. I'm upset because the enemies are cable of such ridiculous shots.
This is the first time I've seen that galaxy wide attack. I missed the event last year and this year we're to seeing to get to that point. Is there are explanation on how/why this form exists?
Yeah I missed it the first time around and this feels like any other raid. Dies in seconds.
Git gud squad coming in hot.
Damn that's some consistent firing. Shooting with the triggers for me and they don't all come out at the same rate. Not to mention the aiming.
I thought the authentic experience was hulk horribly overshooting the balcony and was gonna go "yep" and then you hit me with the float. :D

I'm glad that someone mentioned Karina not getting that much. I love her and she was my first 4* but so many people overrate her spiral by so much. She's better but not by as much people hype her up to be.

A lot of great stuff. Glad to see Cap being able to ram enemies with the shield run. Now hopefully Hulk will be able to pick up vehicles like in the bridge sequence. What else I'd like to see upcoming is camera improvements. Camera distance would be nice. Also they way the camera wraps around when you're in a wall. Instead of having the camera squish up close when you turn into a wall, it should remain the same distance and obstacles should just go transparent like in lots of other games.
Please no pvp
Can you explain that last point?

Yeah I pick up large debris and swing it in a circle. I take the perk that makes the debris more durable so that if the status isn't applied, I can swing it again and it'll apply if for sure. I won't have to pick up a second large debris in that case.

I would like to see a camera reset button. Push it and it centers behind your character. Camera distance setting. Change how far away y the camera is from your character. Camera wall clipping. Instead of zooming inside your character when the camera is in a wall, have objects become transparent and the camera remain where it is. Like other games.
I'd be pretty mad tbh.

Eh. I'll give you the part where it instantly turns around to block you. But when it looks away from you and still hits you with its beam while you're behind it seems to me like another instance of ranged attacks have insane tracking capabilities.
Wuh? Are you telling me that if you hold block, you'll have block/parry frames for the entire duration, even in the middle of evading? That's crazy if so.
And no builds were given.
Everything is new so don't worry, you're as confused as the rest of us and can learn along side us.
She had to have gotten much bigger. She's the size of a small child in the 2nd pic when we know she's small enough to basically chill out on top of Euden's head.
Shit that should be fixed.
Anyone else feel that in an attempt to bring them up to shadow levels, they overturned the fuck out of everyone? A certain Syndrome quote from The Incredibles seems appropriate imo.
Yes, if you go to the relevant fight with the relevant ability unlocked, it'll show you the skill on the character skill page.
And then you've got like 5 SD prints with the same affinity. Like what's the point.
I got grace on mine but I did it with a full gold fafs team. Felt dirty after that.
That's incorrect. Mine were deleted too. You had to build Void bane weapons to make the HDT ones, and I had plenty of those. I have to build all of them all over again
I don't see ally buff zones.

WRITING.TITLE: Water Agito weapon skill
WRITING.TEXT: So is it good enough to use on its own like the other Agito weapon skills? Also, I find it funny that the other elements got a perma 40% strength buff but water got 20%. What SS does Karina use now if so?
What exceptions?
Understandable.
Tbh I ask because they've been out for a while and strats have been developed without the use of them and was wondering if it was worth changing those established strats.
Idk, I like the punch that Eren throws right after R amp; B revealed themselves to be Titans. My initial feeling in that moment stuck, not so much for the punch in the op though.
Has happened to me before. I believe it happens when Kamla is interrupted (or something else idr) while grabbing (maybe crushing) an enemy. He eventually fell out on his own.
Would this mean farming master HDT with the weekly bonus is better for the great spheres?
What was that weird punch you did immediately after activation the support heroic?
I knew Toei was always garbage.
Yeah look at how they drew Tashigi when she first switched bodies with Smoker.
Can't do it without Fjorm.

I'm so upset with myself right now. I saved for so long up to this point that I had 33k wrymite, 120+ single tickets, and 10 ten fold tickets, and I was so itching to summon that I wasted over 340 summons on the first banner to get nothing useful other than the sigil summon. Now I'm down to nothing with only 4 MS0, a bunch of fucking useless dragon dupes, and a single dupe adventurer in Cassandra. Not only will I not have Menee or Gala Zena, I also won't have Ilia in the next banner. I wasted my anniversary summons. :'(
No right now I'm at around low 200s. I won't be able to scrounge up 100 summons by the end.

Yeah I spent a lot already on the first one with no rate up. I was just really itching to summon which was foolish if me. I'm at exactly 200 sigils now with the free 10 fold from the new raid. I got up to 9% rate up at one point.

I gathered up enough wrymite and tickets for another 10 singles and two ten pulls from the Halloween event and got a double rainbow bow drop. I thought this is it. I'll get a dupe Meene but at least I'll get her. Nah. Dupe Nefaria and dupe Scleo.
This is what we have to compete against in the time trials they're bringing back...
So it looks like if you want to farm great spheres and have weekly chests available, master has a slight edge. In solo at least. Didn't check co-op.
Where's one with grace?
Good luck to ya.
Git gud squad not failing to disappoint.
Another day another rainbow bow and it's fucking Pinon.
Ilia in a nutshell: Literally Jesus. Died and like a week later resurrected with no explanation.
I'm regretting spending over 300 summons in the no rate up gala banner even harder now.
1 a month. I'll buy it. I ain't happy about it but I'll buy it.
Would a Marth + 3 Gena be just as fast or faster with less set up?
Eh I don't care much for LoZ tbh.
Surprising silence from the git gud crowd.

I've said it before and I've said it again. When the camera goes into the wall, the wall and other obscuring objects should turn transparent instead of zooming in super close or doing nothing like in this gif.
Jokes on you. I used up a large portion of my stash on the no rate up gala banner. *cries*
There's so many of them and they take so long to get through that I too don't bother with them.

WRITING.TITLE: What is even the point of restart from checkpoint?
WRITING.TEXT: The only reason anyone would ever restart from checkpoint is if the game broke or if they want a do over. But the latter hardly matters when mistakes are saved anyways. Got unlucky and downed by an attack you didn't see coming? Too bad, it's on your permanent record now. Restart checkpoint does nothing useful in its current state other than to hopefully reset a buggy and broken mess.

Your logic is arguing that bugs are fine and okay. If that's the point of the restart then what happens to it if the game isn't broken like it should be? If you want to 100% a stage and you mess up, you have to start from the beginning anyways, so that part of your argument isn't good either.

You and another poster make a good point. I've used that before. I'd find the feature more useful though if I didn't have to use use it to exploit. Please CD, just clear the slate with ranking when you actually restart. That way you don't have to redo 30 min - 1 hr missions over and over again. Especially with all of the jank with combat.
Could you show me this comp?
I apologize that I admittedly only understood maybe every other or every 2 to 3 words. Also, maybe it was a bad run but 5 mins for Tart nowadays is really slow.
I've been saying this and copy teams for a long time.
I hate that restarting a checkpoint does nothing for you if you're going for 100%. If you wanted a do-over, why can't you?
I managed a 10 sec in pubs with 4 Veronica. Don't know how we did it since I haven't replicated it since. 20-30 secs is far more common.
Anyone have a guide on her bnb combo string or rotations?

WRITING.TITLE: QoL: Change to checkpoint restart desperately needed.
WRITING.TEXT: When the best loot is tied to mission rewards at 100%, why would you make it so that we have to play perfectly the entire match? If we make one mistake and get downed, you want us to start over from the beginning? Restarting from checkpoint doesn't reset star losses from being downed. It needs to be changed so that the match is reset after you restart that section, as you would expect it to. It's so disheartening and often rage inducing when you fight for 30 mins or an hour and then get punched or shot in the back and now all of sudden if you want the best gear drop at the end you have to start over.

Imagine making it harder for people to want to play. Especially when we know there are dumb things that are commonly complained about like difficulty seeing enemy attacks. Especially when build options are as limited as they are. Sure, let me play an additional 100 hours to get that perfect drop so I can keep myself from being killed so easily. And then complain about lack of population. And calling it cheating too. Oof.
Obviously I'm not up to date but would anyone kind explaining what kind of haki this is? And is this what Rayleigh did way back then in the slave auction house?
It was so exotics would look better by comparison instead of just making exotics actually better.
This is good gameplay design according to some people.
Some people will blame you for being bad at the game.
Oh look at that. Actually interesting perks that make meaningful gameplay mechanic changes. And overpowering too? Man, final version got the short end.

WRITING.TITLE: Should I cap my stats at some point?
WRITING.TEXT: Is there a point at which a stat has TOO many points? If I spec for 300 might for Hulk, for example, is that just about the level he should be at or is that too much? Same with the other stats. I know it changes based on build, but in general, what should they be sitting around.

WRITING.TITLE: Are these known bugs, and are they being fixed?
WRITING.TEXT: Sometimes, Kamala ai and only Kamala will be downed and will be unable to be revived. Occasionally, one of the attacks the adaptoids use that shoots out what looks like a large gravity ball that causes suppression turns invisible and gets stuck in place. Can be a huge problem in corridors as they have a large area of affect, do tons of damage, and are invisible. They've ruined runs plenty of times.
